attributes.action: establish more mental health support for everyone
attributes.additional_details: more advertising of it via the NHS. there needs to be a push for it in parliament. they are focusing too much on the economy, which is of course important, but people need to realise how much mental health has been effected due to the lockdown. the government need to understand that the economy is not the only thing that is struggling right now
attributes.background: there needs to be more mental health support for people who have suffered or are suffering due to lockdown. mental health is a major issue in the uk, there needs to be more people that are spreading awareness for it.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871

Immediately fund local services to prevent mental health pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313

Increase funding for NHS Adult Mental Health Services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316023

Increased funding/support to Children and Young People's mental health services.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558759

Continue Government funding for national mental health campaigns
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562359
